name: You Da One(Dave Aude Dub)
content: You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
我们的爱缠绵交融 丝丝相扣
Baby, I love you, I need you here
宝贝 我爱你 我需要你一直在我身边
宝贝 我们是命中注定的
You got me, smiling all the time
Cause you know how to give me that
因为你懂得给予的方法
You know how to pull me back
你知道怎样把我拉回来
Tryin' to get away from loving ya
You know how to love me hard
I won't lie, I'm falling hard
我不想否认 我已深陷其中
是的，我深陷你的爱河，但这又有什么不对呢？
You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
我们的爱缠绵交融 丝丝相扣
You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
My love is your love, your love is mine
Baby come, tear me now, hold me now
亲爱的 来吧 折磨我 抱住我
I'm so happy, you came in my life
我很高兴 你来到我的生命里
Cause you know how to give me that
因为你懂得给予的方法
You know how to pull me back
你知道怎样把我拉回来
Tryin' to get away from loving ya
You know how to love me hard
I won't lie, I'm falling hard
我不想否认 我已深陷其中
是的，我深陷你的爱河，但这又有什么不对呢？
You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
我们的爱缠绵交融 丝丝相扣
You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
My love is your love, your love is mine
是的 我有些疯狂了
亲爱的 我现在就是这样
You should've give it to me
有你在 我就会回来
You the one that i'm feeling
You the one that i'm loving
再也找不到任何一个人 和你一样
No there's just one, one, one
You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
我们的爱缠绵交融 丝丝相扣
You the one that I dream about all day
You the one that I think about always
My love is your love, your love is mine
